patterns: What are the departments in the college?
responses: The courses are: computer science,electronics and communication,electrical and civil
We have computer science,electronics and communication,electrical and civil

patterns: What is the fee structure of this college?
responses:
The current fee is:Merit-41030 Mgmt-71030 NRI-106030
You can see detailed structure at:https://www.cetkr.ac.in/fee.php

patterns: Details about admission in the college?
responses: Eligibility for admission is as specified in the Common Entrance Examination conducted by the Govt. of Kerala. The merit & management students are directed by the Chief Entrance Commissioner according to the Entrance ranking through online counseling. 60% seats are free seats, 35% seats are management seats and 5% seats are reserved for NRI students selected directly on merit basis. Also the Government have accorded sanction for the increase of 5% seats for implementing the tuition fee waivers scheme (FWS) for women, economically backward and physically challenged meritorious students.See here for the intake details:https://www.cetkr.ac.in/admission.php

patterns: Who is the principal of CETKR?
responses: The principal at present is Dr.Vinod Pottakulath
The college was established in the year 2000 under CAPE

patterns: What event is happening right now?
what are the events in the college?
responses: we,re just done with our national level techfest INQUA 3.0.Stay tuned for more updates

patterns: What are the facilities in the college?
responses: The college is well equipped with a central library and a central computing facility.We have very advanced labs and workshops.We also have a central auditoriam.
Our college is located in Cheemeni,Kasaragod.The nearest railway station is Cheruvathur.

patterns: Is this college govt or self financing?
Is CETKR a self financing college?
responses: CETKR is a government self-financing engineering college.

patterns: Which are the top recruiting companies of the college?
responses: The top recruiters are TCS,Quest Global,Infosys,Qburst,Wipro

patterns: Is there hostel facility in the college?
responses: We have a ladies hostel.There is no boys hostel available
